description: A CBS News presentation, this film views some gifted children in Washington. Covers the following points regarding gifted children:  early entry into tertiary education, emotional maturity, the attitudes of peers, parents, and teachers and the types of problems encountered with early entry to universities and the resultant support needed. Suitable for teacher/tertiary level.
